languages.text: "Кейтан... Кейта-а-ан, сын мой..." {n}Истерзанное тело эльдарского провидца едва шевелится. Вы уже видели подобных тварей — сшитые из разных тел, они влачат свое жалкое существование, дабы насытить болезненный интерес хозяина-гемункула к извращениям плоти. И все же... это существо отличается от других. Двуликое лицо, сшитое из нескольких {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдар{/g} женских и мужских особей, обращается к вам невидящим взглядом грубо зашитых глаз.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Кейтан... Кейта-а-ан, сын мой..." {n}Истерзанное тело эльдарского провидца едва шевелится. Вы уже видели подобных тварей — сшитые из разных тел, они волочат свое жалкое существование, дабы насытить болезненный интерес хозяина-гемункула к извращениям плоти. И все же... это существо отличается от других. Двуликое лицо, сшитое из нескольких {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдар{/g} женских и мужских особей, обращается к вам невидящим взглядом грубо зашитых глаз.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: "Caetan... Caetaaan, my son..." {n}The Aeldari Farseer's tortured body is barely moving. You have seen abject creatures like this before: stitched together from several bodies, their miserable existence serves but to satisfy their Haemonculus master's morbid interest in perversions of the flesh. And yet... this one is not like the others. A twin face stitched together from parts of several male and female {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} turns its unseeing gaze toward you. Its eyes have been crudely sewn shut.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кейтан... Кейта-а-ан, сын мой..." {n}Истерзанное тело эльдарского провидца едва шевелится. И все же... это существо отличается от других. Двуликое лицо, сшитое из нескольких {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдар{/g} женских и мужских особей, обращается к вам невидящим взглядом грубо зашитых глаз.{/n}

languages.text: «Caetan... Caetaaan, hijo mío...». {n}El cuerpo torturado del vidente Aeldari casi no se mueve. Ya has visto antes criaturas abyectas como esta: creadas a partir de varios cuerpos suturados cuya existencia únicamente sirve para satisfacer los macabros intereses de su amo hemónculo por las aberraciones de la carne. Y sin embargo... esta no es como las demás. Un rostro doble, una amalgama de partes de diversos {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} tanto varones como hembras, vuelve su mirada ciega hacia ti. Le han cosido burdamente los párpados.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Caetan... Caetaaan, my son..." {n}The Aeldari Farseer's tortured body is barely moving. You have seen abject creatures like this before: stitched together from several bodies, their miserable existence serves but to satisfy their Haemonculus master's morbid interest in perversions of the flesh. And yet... this one is not like the others. A twin face stitched together from parts of several male and female {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} turns its unseeing gaze toward you. Its eyes have been crudely sewn shut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Caetan... Caetaaan, hijo mío...». {n}El cuerpo torturado del vidente Aeldari casi no se mueve. Ya has visto antes criaturas abyectas como esta: creadas a partir de varios cuerpos suturados cuya existencia únicamente sirve para satisfacer los macabros intereses de su amo hemónculo por las aberraciones de la carne. Y sin embargo... esta no es como las demás. Un rostro doble, una amalgama de partes de diversos {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} tanto varones como hembras, vuelve su mirada ciega hacia ti. Le han cosido burdamente los párpados.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: 「カエタン…カエタン、我が息子よ…」{n}アエルダリの先見司の拷問された体はほとんど動いていない。あなたはこのような悲惨な化け物を以前にも見たことがある。複数の体を縫い合わされてできた哀れなそいつらは、そのご主人であるハモンキュラスの異常な肉体への倒錯と興味を満たすためだけの存在だ。しかし…これはそいつらとは違う。複数の女性と男性の{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}のパーツを縫い合わせて作られた２つの顔が、うつろな視線をこちらに向けている。その目は粗く縫い閉じられている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Caetan... Caetaaan, my son..." {n}The Aeldari Farseer's tortured body is barely moving. You have seen abject creatures like this before: stitched together from several bodies, their miserable existence serves but to satisfy their Haemonculus master's morbid interest in perversions of the flesh. And yet... this one is not like the others. A twin face stitched together from parts of several male and female {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} turns its unseeing gaze toward you. Its eyes have been crudely sewn shut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「カエタン…カエタン、我が息子よ…」{n}アエルダリの先見司の拷問された体はほとんど動いていない。あなたはこのような悲惨な化け物を以前にも見たことがある。複数の体を縫い合わされてできた哀れなそいつらは、そのご主人であるハモンキュラスの異常な肉体への倒錯と興味を満たすためだけの存在だ。しかし…これはそいつらとは違う。複数の女性と男性の{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}のパーツを縫い合わせて作られた２つの顔が、うつろな視線をこちらに向けている。その目は粗く縫い閉じられている。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: “卡坦……卡……卡坦，我的儿子……”{n}这位艾达灵族先知饱受折磨，身体几乎无法动弹。你以前也见过类似的可怜生物，这些怪物由多个生物的肢体拼接在一起，他们悲惨的生命仅仅是为了满足血伶人对血肉的病态兴趣。然而……眼前的这只生物，和你之前见过的又有些不大一样。它的两张脸上缝着许多张不同的面孔，由{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}男性与女性的脸拼接而成，眼睛被草草缝了起来。这只生物将脸转向你，被缝住的双眼看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Caetan... Caetaaan, my son..." {n}The Aeldari Farseer's tortured body is barely moving. You have seen abject creatures like this before: stitched together from several bodies, their miserable existence serves but to satisfy their Haemonculus master's morbid interest in perversions of the flesh. And yet... this one is not like the others. A twin face stitched together from parts of several male and female {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} turns its unseeing gaze toward you. Its eyes have been crudely sewn shut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “卡坦……卡……卡坦，我的儿子……”{n}这位艾达灵族先知饱受折磨，身体几乎无法动弹。你以前也见过类似的可怜生物，这些怪物由多个生物的肢体拼接在一起，他们悲惨的生命仅仅是为了满足血伶人对血肉的病态兴趣。然而……眼前的这只生物，和你之前见过的又有些不大一样。它的两张脸上缝着许多张不同的面孔，由{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}男性与女性的脸拼接而成，眼睛被草草缝了起来。这只生物将脸转向你，被缝住的双眼看着你。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: « Caetan... Caetan, mon fils... » {n}Le corps torturé du Grand Prophète aeldari bouge à peine. Vous avez déjà vu de telles créatures : constituées de plusieurs corps, leur misérable existence a pour unique objectif de satisfaire l'intérêt morbide de leur maître hémoncule pour les perversions de la chair. Et pourtant... celui-ci n'est pas comme les autres. Un visage aux multiples facettes, composé de plusieurs hommes et femmes {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}aeldaris{/g}, tourne son regard aveugle vers vous. Ses yeux ont été fermés par des sutures grossières.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Caetan... Caetaaan, my son..." {n}The Aeldari Farseer's tortured body is barely moving. You have seen abject creatures like this before: stitched together from several bodies, their miserable existence serves but to satisfy their Haemonculus master's morbid interest in perversions of the flesh. And yet... this one is not like the others. A twin face stitched together from parts of several male and female {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} turns its unseeing gaze toward you. Its eyes have been crudely sewn shut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Caetan... Caetan, mon fils... » {n}Le corps torturé du Grand Prophète aeldari bouge à peine. Vous avez déjà vu de telles créatures : constituées de plusieurs corps, leur misérable existence a pour unique objectif de satisfaire l'intérêt morbide de leur maître hémoncule pour les perversions de la chair. Et pourtant... celui-ci n'est pas comme les autres. Un visage aux multiples facettes, composé de plusieurs hommes et femmes {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}aeldaris{/g}, tourne son regard aveugle vers vous. Ses yeux ont été fermés par des sutures grossières.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: "Caetan ... Caetaaan, mein Sohn ..." {n}Der misshandelte Körper des Aeldari-Runenpropheten bewegt sich kaum noch. Du hast solche erbärmlichen Kreaturen schon einmal gesehen. Sie wurden aus mehreren Leibern zusammengenäht und existieren einzig zum morbiden Vergnügen ihres Haemonculus-Meisters – er will damit seine Perversionen des Fleisches befriedigen. Und trotzdem ... ist dieser nicht wie die anderen. Ein zweigeteiltes Gesicht, das aus mehreren männlichen und weiblichen {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} zusammengenäht wurde, richtet seinen leeren Blick auf dich. Seine Augen wurden plump zugenäht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Caetan... Caetaaan, my son..." {n}The Aeldari Farseer's tortured body is barely moving. You have seen abject creatures like this before: stitched together from several bodies, their miserable existence serves but to satisfy their Haemonculus master's morbid interest in perversions of the flesh. And yet... this one is not like the others. A twin face stitched together from parts of several male and female {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} turns its unseeing gaze toward you. Its eyes have been crudely sewn shut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Caetan ... Caetaaan, mein Sohn ..." {n}Der misshandelte Körper des Aeldari-Runenpropheten bewegt sich kaum noch. Du hast solche erbärmlichen Kreaturen schon einmal gesehen. Sie wurden aus mehreren Leibern zusammengenäht und existieren einzig zum morbiden Vergnügen ihres Haemonculus-Meisters – er will damit seine Perversionen des Fleisches befriedigen. Und trotzdem ... ist dieser nicht wie die anderen. Ein zweigeteiltes Gesicht, das aus mehreren männlichen und weiblichen {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} zusammengenäht wurde, richtet seinen leeren Blick auf dich. Seine Augen wurden plump zugenäht.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: "Caetan... Caetan, oğlum..." {n}Aeldari Ötesezen'in işkence görmüş bedeni, zar zor kıpırdıyor. Böylesi perişan yaratıkları daha önce de görmüştün. Pek çok bedenin birbirine dikilmesiyle ortaya çıkan acınası varlıkları, yalnızca Haimonkulus efendilerinin çarpıtılan bedenlere karşı hastalıklı ilgisini tatmin etmeye yarar. Ancak bu gördüğün, diğerlerine benzemiyor. Birçok erkek ve kadın {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} uzuvlarının dikilmesiyle oluşan çift yüzü, görmeyen bakışlarını sana dikiyor. Göz kapakları kabaca birbirine dikilmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Caetan... Caetaaan, my son..." {n}The Aeldari Farseer's tortured body is barely moving. You have seen abject creatures like this before: stitched together from several bodies, their miserable existence serves but to satisfy their Haemonculus master's morbid interest in perversions of the flesh. And yet... this one is not like the others. A twin face stitched together from parts of several male and female {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} turns its unseeing gaze toward you. Its eyes have been crudely sewn shut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Caetan... Caetan, oğlum..." {n}Aeldari Ötesezen'in işkence görmüş bedeni zar zor kıpırdıyor. Böylesi perişan yaratıkları daha önce de görmüştün. Pek çok bedenin birbirine dikilmesiyle ortaya çıkan acınası varlıkları, yalnızca Haimonkulus efendilerinin çarpıtılan bedenlere karşı hastalıklı ilgisini tatmin etmeye yarıyor. Yine de... Bu gördüğün diğerlerine benzemiyor. Birçok erkek ve kadın {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} parçalarının dikilmesiyle oluşan çift yüzü, görmeyen bakışlarını sana dikiyor. Göz kapakları kabaca birbirine dikilmiş.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01
